alert.note: Alert for Goliad; Victoria (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 18 at 6:59PM CDT by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Victoria and northeastern Goliad Counties through 730 PM CDT... At 659 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Coleto Creek Park, or 11 miles east of Goliad, moving south at 5 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Victoria, Fannin, Schroeder, Coleto Creek Park, Saxet Lakes, Ander, Oak Village, Mission Valley, Weesatche, Weser and Nursery. This includes the following highways... US Highway 183 between mile markers 628 and 638. US Highway 59 between mile markers 642 and 656. US Highway 77 between mile markers 580 and 586. US Highway 87 between mile markers 798 and 800. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
